member.name: T:AdcsToRest.ActiveDirectory
member.summary: A class holding methods that help acquiring PKI related information from Active Directory.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.ActiveDirectory.GetCertificationAuthority(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves a certification authority and the templates bound to it from Active Directory.
member.param: The name of the target certification authority.
Causes returned PKIX data to be encoded according to RFC 7468 instead of a plain BASE64 stream.
member.exception: Throws a HTTP 404 error if the specified certification authority was not found in Active Directory.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.ActiveDirectory.GetCertificationAuthorityCollection(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of all certification authorities in the Active Directory forest, and the templates bound to each.
member.param: Causes returned PKIX data to be encoded according to RFC 7468 instead of a plain BASE64 stream.

member.name: T:AdcsToRest.CCertRequestExtensions
member.summary: A class that extends the functionality if ICertRequest for the needs of our API.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.CCertRequestExtensions.RetrievePending(CERTCLILib.CCertRequest,System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves a certificate from a certification authority.
member.param: The configuration string of the certification authority.
Specifies if the certificate shall be returned as a PKCS#7 container that includes the entire certificate chain.
Causes returned PKIX data to be encoded according to RFC 7468 instead of a plain BASE64 stream.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.CCertRequestExtensions.Submit(CERTCLILib.CCertRequest,System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Submits a certificate request to a certification authority.
member.param: The configuration string of the certification authority.
The certificate request as BASE64 without headers.
An optional list of request attributes that shall be passed to the certificate authority.
Submission flags.
Specifies if the certificate shall be returned as a PKCS#7 container that includes the entire certificate chain.
Causes returned PKIX data to be encoded according to RFC 7468 instead of a plain BASE64 stream.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.CCertRequestExtensions.GetCrlDpCollection(CERTCLILib.CCertRequest,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves certificate revocation list distribution point information from a certification authority.
member.param: The configuration string of the certification authority.
Causes returned PKIX data to be encoded according to RFC 7468 instead of a plain BASE64 stream.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.CCertRequestExtensions.GetAiaCollection(CERTCLILib.CCertRequest,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves authority information access information from a certification authority.
member.param: The configuration string of the certification authority.
Causes returned PKIX data to be encoded according to RFC 7468 instead of a plain BASE64 stream.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.CCertRequestExtensions.GetCaCertificate(CERTCLILib.CCertRequest,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves a CA or CA exchange certificate from a certification authority.
member.param: The configuration string of the certification authority.
Specifies if the certificate shall be returned as a PKCS#7 container that includes the entire certificate chain.
Returns the CA exchange certificate instead of the CA certificate.
Causes returned PKIX data to be encoded according to RFC 7468 instead of a plain BASE64 stream.

member.name: T:AdcsToRest.CertificateRequestIntegrityChecks
member.summary: A class that helps identifying the type of the certificate request and harmonizing it for further processing.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.CertificateRequestIntegrityChecks.VerifyCertificateRequest(System.String,System.Int32,System.String@)
member.summary: Verifies if the certificate request can be parsed as defined by the requestType.
member.param: The certificate request in BASE64 format, with or without headers.
The request type specifies how the certificate request is to be interpreted.
Harmonized certificate request, returned as BASE64 without header, regardless of the given input.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.CertificateRequestIntegrityChecks.DetectRequestType(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Identifies the type of a given certificate request.
member.param: The input certificate request as BASE64 encoded DER.
The output certificate request as BASE64 encoded DER.
member.returns: The request type to be used with ICertRequest::Submit.

member.name: T:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificationAuthoritiesController
member.summary: An API controller for all operations related to a certification authority.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificationAuthoritiesController.GetAllCas(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves a collection of all available certification authorities.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificationAuthoritiesController.GetCaByName(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves details for a certification authority.
member.param: The common name of the target certification authority.
Causes returned PKIX data to be encoded according to RFC 7468 instead of a plain BASE64 stream.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificationAuthoritiesController.GetCaCertificate(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves the current certification authority certificate for a certification authority.
member.param: The common name of the target certification authority.
Causes the response to be a PKCS#7 container including the certificate chain.
Causes returned PKIX data to be encoded according to RFC 7468 instead of a plain BASE64 stream.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificationAuthoritiesController.GetCaExchangeCertificate(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves the current certification authority exchange certificate for a certification authority.
member.param: The common name of the target certification authority.
Causes the response to be a PKCS#7 container including the certificate chain.
Causes returned PKIX data to be encoded according to RFC 7468 instead of a plain BASE64 stream.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificationAuthoritiesController.GetCrlDp(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves a collection of certificate revocation list distribution points for a certification authority.
member.param: The common name of the target certification authority.
Causes returned PKIX data to be encoded according to RFC 7468 instead of a plain BASE64 stream.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificationAuthoritiesController.GetAia(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves a collection of authority information access distribution points for a certification authority.
member.param: The common name of the target certification authority.
Causes returned PKIX data to be encoded according to RFC 7468 instead of a plain BASE64 stream.

member.name: T:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificatesController
member.summary: An API controller for all operations related to PKIX certificates.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificatesController.GetCertificateByRequestId(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves an issued certificate from a certification authority.
member.param: The common name of the target certification authority.
The request identifier of the certificate to retrieve.
Causes the response to be a PKCS#7 container including the certificate chain.
Causes returned PKIX data to be encoded according to RFC 7468 instead of a plain BASE64 stream.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificatesController.SubmitCertificateRequest(System.String,AdcsToRest.Models.CertificateRequest,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Submits a certificate signing request to a certification authority.
member.param: The common name of the target certification authority.
The data structure containing the certificate request and optional settings.
The certificate template the certificate request shall be assigned to.
Causes the response to be a PKCS#7 container including the certificate chain.
Causes returned PKIX data to be encoded according to RFC 7468 instead of a plain BASE64 stream.

member.name: T:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificateTemplatesController
member.summary: An API controller for all operations related to certificate templates.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificateTemplatesController.GetCertificateTemplateCollection
member.summary: Retrieves a collection of all certificate templates in the underlying Active Directory environment.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificateTemplatesController.GetCertificateTemplate(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves details for a certificate template.
member.param: The name of the target certificate template.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificateTemplatesController.GetCertificateTemplateIssuers(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves a collection of certification authorities that issue certificates for a given certificate template.
member.param: The name of the target certificate template.
Causes returned PKIX data to be encoded according to RFC 7468 instead of a plain BASE64 stream.

member.name: T:AdcsToRest.LocalizedStrings
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.LocalizedStrings.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.LocalizedStrings.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.LocalizedStrings.DESC_CA_DENIED
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You do not have permission to request certificates from {0}..

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.LocalizedStrings.DESC_INVALID_CSR
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unable to parse the given certificate request..

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.LocalizedStrings.DESC_MISSING_CA
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The certification authority {0} was not found..

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.LocalizedStrings.DESC_MISSING_PARAMETER
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The {0} parameter is missing or invalid..

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.LocalizedStrings.DESC_MISSING_TEMPLATE
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The certificate template {0} was not found..

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.LocalizedStrings.DESC_SUBMISSION_FAILED
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unable to connect to certification authority because {0}..

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.LocalizedStrings.DESC_TEMPLATED_DENIED
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You do not have permission to enroll for {0}..

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.LocalizedStrings.UNKNOWN
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to unknown.
